meanings.definition: A protective covering for the toe of a shoe.
meanings.sent1: The toecap on my shoe kept my toe safe from getting hurt.
meanings.sent2: She bought new shoes with a sturdy toecap to protect her toes.
meanings.sent3: The toecap on the shoe was like a tiny shield for the toe, ready for any adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her toecap was a fortress for her toes, guarding them from harm.
meanings.sent5: The bright red toecap stood out, reminding her of a cherry on top of a cake.

meanings.definition: To cover the toe of a shoe with a protective cap.
meanings.sent1: He carefully toecapped his shoes before going out in the rain.
meanings.sent2: She toecaps her favorite boots to make them last longer.
meanings.sent3: The shoemaker toecapped the worn-out shoes, giving them a new lease on life.
meanings.sent4: They toecap their shoes like a ritual, ensuring durability and style.
meanings.sent5: Toecapping his shoes became a habit, a way to show care for his footwear.
